name: Short Dark
description:
In this game you have to survive for a couple days, before being saved.

Surviving includes fishing, cooking fish, boiling water and collecting wood to keep your fire alive. If you go far from your any source of fire, you will freeze. 

    •Interactions happen by holding down the left ALT key and Left Clicking, 
     there is no other inputs just W,A,S,D which is movement. 

    •You can fuel a fire by adding twigs onto it and you can light it up with a burning torch. 

    •If your torch would happen to blow out, you have to re-light it at a campfire. 

    •Scrolling moves your camera up/down. 

    •Space drops all the items you're holding
